cosmos.question: I'm big and bright, and I give you light during the day. What am I?

hints.text: 🌞 I appear at the start of each day

cosmos.question: I'm round and I spin, and you live on me. What am I?
I appear at night, sometimes full, sometimes just a sliver. What am I?

hints.text: 🧀 I don't make my own light.

cosmos.question: I'm a big ball of gas that is very far away and twinkles at night. What am I?

hints.text: ✨ There are billions of me in the sky.
🔭 You need a telescope to see me well.
🌟 The Sun is one of me.

cosmos.question: I'm a planet that's red and dusty. People sometimes call me the Red Planet. What am I?

hints.text: 🚀 People have sent rovers to explore me.
🍫 My color is like rusty metal.

cosmos.question: I am a group of stars that make a picture in the sky. What am I?

hints.text: Ursa Major contains the Big Dipper.
🦄 Some are named after animals and mythical creatures.

cosmos.question: I am the largest planet in our solar system, known for my big red spot. What am I?

hints.text: 🌪️ My spot is actually a giant storm.
🪐 I have many moons orbiting me.
🔴 I'm known as a gas giant.

cosmos.question: I'm a big group of stars, gas, and dust, all held together by gravity. Our Sun is part of me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌀 I have a spiral shape when viewed from above
✨ There are billions of others like me in the universe

cosmos.question: I am a huge cloud of gas and dust in space, where new stars are born. What am I?

hints.text: 🎨 I can be very colorful and beautiful.
☁️ I'm made of hydrogen, helium, and other elements

cosmos.question: I'm a planet known for my beautiful rings. What am I?

hints.text: 💍 My rings are made of ice, rocks, and dust.
🪐 I am the second largest planet in our Solar System.

animal.question: I have a long trunk and big ears, and I love to eat peanuts. What am I?

hints.text: 🥜 I love to eat this snack!
💧 I use my trunk to drink water.

animal.question: I say 'meow' and love to chase mice. What am I?

hints.text: 🧶 I like to play with yarn.

animal.question: I have a fluffy tail and like to bury nuts. What am I?

hints.text: 🌰 I gather food for the winter.

animal.question: I quack and swim in the pond. What am I?

hints.text: 🌧️ I like to swim in the rain.

animal.question: I'm known as the 'king of the jungle' and have a loud roar. What am I?
I have black and white stripes and live in Africa. What am I?

hints.text: 🦓 I look a bit like a horse.

animal.question: I hop around and carry my baby in a pouch. What am I?

hints.text: 💪 I have strong legs for jumping.

animal.question: I build dams and have large teeth. What am I?

hints.text: 🪵 I like to chew on wood.

animal.question: I'm a reptile that can change color to blend in. What am I?
I am a nocturnal bird known for my 'who-who' sound. What am I?
